title: Landscape in the Style of Taiga
marks: Signature and Seals LR: [Chikuseki dojin sha]
description: several rocky slopes at top with boulders and trees; large boulder-like outcropping at R with trees at top; man in fishing boat at LL gazing upward
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
